definition: to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)
to grasp/to hold/to operate/to manage/to control/to steer/to exercise/to drill (practice)/to play/to speak (a language)

sentences.english: Men can also benefit from strengthening their pelvic floor muscles by doing pelvic floor exercises.
sentences.chinese: 男人也可以受益于加强骨盆做自由体操的盆底肌肉。

sentences.english: They each had to perform on three pieces of equipment as well as the floor.
sentences.chinese: 她们每人既要表演自由体操，还得完成三项器械动作。

sentences.english: Both men and women do floor exercises on the mat.
sentences.chinese: 男子和女子的自由体操是在垫子上进行的。

sentences.english: There was almost an upset in the finals of the men's floor exercise.
sentences.chinese: 男子自由体操决赛几乎爆出冷门。

sentences.english: Do you like to watch the free-style exercises?
She did her floor exercises with agility and grace.
sentences.chinese: 她的自由体操动作轻巧，姿势优美。

sentences.english: Our country's free exercise used to gain glorious achievements in the Olympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 我国的自由体操在奥运会上取得过辉煌的成绩。

sentences.english: Is floor exercises one of the set exercises for men?
sentences.chinese: 自由体操是男子规定动作中的一项吗？

sentences.english: The floor exercise routines are performed to music with choreography.
sentences.chinese: 自由体操的常规动作是伴随着音乐进行的。

sentences.english: Her movements in free gymnastics are lithe and graceful.
sentences.chinese: 她的自由体操动作轻盈优美。
